catalog.description: Synthesis of news media competencies gained through successful completion of directed project. Projects may include a digital media product, in-depth reportage or documentary, working prototype, market research, or scholarly work. Projects may be done individually or in groups.
catalog.prerequisite: Comms 420 or Comms 422; Comms 486 or Comms 488.
catalog.title: Media Innovations Capstone.

course_headers.header_text: COMMS 490 is a News Media capstone class. It requires a permission-to-add code. If you wish to add this class, please go to the front desk in 360 BRMB and obtain a contract. You must have the instructor of the class sign the contract before you can receive the add code.
